verbs.description: [ARG1: The former Mexican president] [V: sat] down [ARG2: with CNBC 's John Harwood] [ARGM-PRP: to discuss North America 's economic future – and Trump] , [ARGM-ADV: of course] .
[ARG0: The former Mexican president] sat down with CNBC 's John Harwood to [V: discuss] [ARG1: North America 's economic future – and Trump] , of course .
